test.name: AP002 Verificar que la previsualización está funcionando correctamente a través del texto de preview

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.
kw.msg: Opening browser 'Chrome' to base url 'http://automationpractice.com/index.php'.

kw.name: Set Focus To Element
kw.doc: Sets the focus to the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Set Window Size
kw.doc: Sets current windows size to given ``width`` and ``height``.

kw.name: Set Selenium Speed
kw.doc: Sets the delay that is waited after each Selenium command.

kw.name: Element Should Not Be Visible
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is NOT visible.

arguments.arg: css=#homefeatured > li:nth-child(${cadaItem}) > div > div.left-block > div > div.quick-view-wrapper-mobile > a > i

kw.msg: Element 'css=#homefeatured > li:nth-child(1) > div > div.left-block > div > div.quick-view-wrapper-mobile > a > i' exists but is not displayed.

kw.name: Get Text
kw.doc: Returns the text value of the element identified by ``locator``.

arguments.arg: css=#homefeatured > li:nth-child(${cadaItem}) > div > div.right-block > h5 > a

kw.msg: ${objetoTitulo} = Faded Short Sleeve T-shirts

kw.name: Mouse Over
kw.doc: Simulates hovering the mouse over the element ``locator``.

arguments.arg: css=#homefeatured > li:nth-child(${cadaItem}) > div > div.left-block > div > a.product_img_link > img

kw.msg: Simulating Mouse Over on element 'css=#homefeatured > li:nth-child(1) > div > div.left-block > div > a.product_img_link > img'.

kw.name: Wait Until Keyword Succeeds
kw.doc: Runs the specified keyword and retries if it fails.

arguments.arg: css=#homefeatured > li:nth-child(${cadaItem}) > div > div.left-block > div > a.quick-view > span

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

arguments.arg: css=#homefeatured > li:nth-child(${cadaItem}) > div > div.left-block > div > a.quick-view > span

kw.msg: Clicking element 'css=#homefeatured > li:nth-child(1) > div > div.left-block > div > a.quick-view > span'.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

arguments.arg: css=#index > div.fancybox-overlay.fancybox-overlay-fixed > div > div > div > div > iframe

kw.name: Select Frame
kw.doc: Sets frame identified by ``locator`` as the current frame.

arguments.arg: css=#index > div.fancybox-overlay.fancybox-overlay-fixed > div > div > div > div > iframe

kw.msg: Selecting frame 'css=#index > div.fancybox-overlay.fancybox-overlay-fixed > div > div > div > div > iframe'.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.
kw.msg: Verifying element 'css=#product > div > div > div.pb-center-column.col-xs-12.col-sm-4 > h1' contains exact text 'Faded Short Sleeve T-shirts'.

kw.name: Unselect Frame
kw.doc: Sets the main frame as the current frame.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Clicking element 'css=#index > div.fancybox-overlay.fancybox-overlay-fixed > div > div > a'.

kw.name: Element Should Not Be Visible
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is NOT visible.

arguments.arg: css=#homefeatured > li:nth-child(${cadaItem}) > div > div.left-block > div > div.quick-view-wrapper-mobile > a > i

kw.doc: Returns the text value of the element identified by ``locator``.
